title: 197 - THANK YEW MAGAWA
description: On today's show, the boys chat about what they did over the weekend and Bill gives an update on his house of horrors. Today's show see's a LOADED Pod Fod that includes the boys paying homage to Magawa, the war hero mine sniffing rat who recently passed away after eight years of service, and sniffed out over 100 unexploded mines, they chat about some of the best eyebrows in the history of Russia, Gumpy explains the origin of "touque," the boys discuss some movies and TV shows they have been paying attention to, break down a Canadian man who made his wife shovel their driveway after working an overnight shift at the hospital, and much more. Don't forget to send your submissions to the Pod Fod to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and watch full episodes of The Pod at Youtube.com/ThePodPMI. We appreciate you all for listening, we'll see you next week.
